about_the_game:
Kozan is the country featured in the Chuhou Joutai trilogy. In Touhou Kourinden ~ Mythos of Phantasmagoria, you can discover the epic beginning of the Federal Kingdom of Kozan.

Although you’ll only need a bit of finger speed, you will be required to use critical thinking and deductive reasoning to figure out how to defeat your enemies.

The King of Sweden has given you a prophecy. The Scarlet Devil is laying evil waste on the Land of Illusions. You are a half-youkai lad named Kourin. Teaming up with three female magicians, you will embark on the dangerous task of seeking the Scarlet Devil and putting an end to his wrath.

This will not be an easy task for you. Dangerous monsters and outlaws inhabit the roads. Your coming to the Land of Illusions was foretold by prophets. Your female magicians won’t be afraid to help you on your journey. In order to defeat the Scarlet Devil, you will have to gather four legendary objects.

You can save up to three adventure logs. During your confrontation with monsters and outlaws, you will need wisdom to make the right decisions. As you battle your way throughout the Land of Illusions, you will gain experience and strength. As you search for the Scarlet Devil in this role-playing adventure, you can also learn how the legend of Queen Marisa unfolds!

Features

NOTE: Basic reading ability is required to fully enjoy this game.
  • An epic story divided into six acts
  • Four different playable characters with unique stats
  • Over 60 different pieces of equipment and 80 different skills to learn
